entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 12. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
